posts.post_content:
While this is my first post on this board, a few of you may know me from numerous facebook groups.

I am searching for any Claude Rossman cards, pins, postcards, etc.  Most people have no interest in Claude. He was born in Mellenville, NY and lies in an unmarked grave just a few miles from my home. He batted behind Ty Cobb and held his own for the Tigers. If it wasn't for the yips, he could have been a very special player.

I have a small collection of Sweet Corporal and Piedmont cards, but not many others. 

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks!

Matt
